title: Multi - dimensional mechanism analysis ofChoerospondias axillaris(Roxb.) Burtt et Hill in treating kidney stones: network pharmacology, molecular docking andin vitroexperimental verification.
abstract: Choerospondias axillaris(Roxb.) Burtt et Hill(CA) is a medicinal and edible plant fruit with national characteristics in China. CA is commonly used in folk medicine for treating kidney diseases, heart diseases, and calming the mind. Modern pharmacological studies have demonstrated that CA exhibits effects such as protection against renal injury, antioxidation, anti-inflammation, and calcium antagonism.
